item.title: Read Input Data From USB Devices in Linux
item.description: Introduction You just bought a new input device like barcode scanner, proximity card reader with USB port. And you want expose only its data to a file or send to server for processing ? But it acts like a keyboard, type the characters then trigger Enter key. This tutorial can help you make a program can exclusive receive input data from the device and don’t affect to another program.
